featured.title: No Prime Keys or Bundles?
featured.sub_title: GCA Launcher is a Long Term Supported project which comes with alot of time and effort. Selling our pro features individually creates a strong bond with our users as well as a profitable product to develop on through the years to come.

featured.title: What's A Pledge?
featured.sub_title: Pledges are simply a promise from the user. purchasing a pledge does nothing from a feature stand point but it unlocks a badge or a reputation. That reputation gives them the upper hand on promotional give aways as well as supporting development from a higher perspective.

featured.title: Winter is here!
featured.sub_title: The GCA Launcher Material You update is live!
